terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Terms and Conditions for Trygg Admin Platform

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to Trygg Admin Platform. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our administrative system designed for managing transportation services, drivers, passengers, and related operations. By accessing or using this platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using the Trygg Admin Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, you must not use this platform.

authorization.title: 3.1 Authorization
authorization.text: Access to this platform is restricted to authorized personnel only. Users must possess valid credentials and appropriate authorization levels to access specific features.

accountSecurity.title: 3.2 Account Security
accountSecurity.text: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials and for all activities that occur under their account.

dataIntegrity.title: 4.1 Data Integrity
dataIntegrity.text: Users must ensure all data entered into the system is accurate, complete, and up-to-date. Any intentional entry of false or misleading information is strictly prohibited.

privacyCompliance.title: 4.2 Privacy Compliance
privacyCompliance.text: All personal data must be handled in accordance with applicable privacy laws and regulations. Users must respect the privacy rights of drivers, passengers, and other stakeholders.

userResponsibilities.title: 5. User Responsibilities
list: Maintain accurate and current information in all records
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Report any security incidents or data breaches immediately
Use the platform solely for authorized business purposes

prohibitedActivities.title: 6. Prohibited Activities
list: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to any part of the system
Sharing login credentials with unauthorized individuals
Using the platform for personal or non-business purposes
Modifying, reverse engineering, or attempting to extract source code
Interfering with the normal operation of the platform

limitationOfLiability.text: Trygg Admin Platform is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim all liability for any damages arising from the use of this platform, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.text: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to the platform at any time, without prior notice, for violations of these terms or for any other reason we deem appropriate.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes, and continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.text: For questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact our legal department or system administrators through the appropriate channels within your organization.
